content: Hi, we have a simple FHIR reference server we use to publish profiles, valuesets and operationdefinitions as a reference for use across a number of implementations in other systems. It's DSTU2 at present, and I've run crucible against it and got some useful results. How can I get a bit more detail about the specifics of the failed tests so I can reproduce them for troubleshooting? The description of the test in the web ui is ok, but doesn't really give me enough detail to reproduce the issues.. are the test definitions available in Github or somewhere else so I can dig into them in more detail?

@Adam Hatherly the test definitions are in github. See https://github.com/fhir-crucible/plan_executor/tree/master/lib/tests

You can also run the plan_executor on your command line. Just make sure to checkout the dstu2 branch.
